info.name: Weasyl - Enhanced
info.description: Just putting this up in case anyone else wants it. Basically, it fixes some nagging annoyances that I have with Weasyl. It removes the background images so that everything is solid color, it removes some rounded borders, flattens the buttons, and fixes a few formatting issues (such as the space between the side of the page and the profile). I also changed the journal list on pages so that it's not just a small list of links. Contact me on Weasyl (Atraius) for input or bugs!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.3.2 -
Forgot to remove some lines of the stylesheet that I was using for testing

Version 0.3.1 -
Fixed positioning of top menu on mobile

Version 0.3.0 -
Fixed the padding on the right side of the mobile site.
Brand new mobile menu behavior. Click the Weasyl logo to expand the menu now instead of having a dedicated bar.

Version 0.2.3 -
Page title padding fix. Oops. 

Version 0.2.2 -
Fixed word spacing issue, and border gap on page title

Version 0.2.1 -
Got rid of the rainbow header border, changed the look of the page titles, fixed some padding issues

Version 0.1.1 -
Fixed Journal List

Version 0.1 -
Initial Release
